newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Guangdong Infrastructure to set US$202 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Guangdong Infrastructure to set US$202 mln FRN.

text.p: Guangdong Infrastructure Ltd plans to raise funds via a US$202 million floating rate note issue, bankers said Friday.
They said the notes will be launched into general syndication next week.
The issuer is a special purpose company wholly-owned by China Investment Ltd, which in turn is an affiliated company of Guangdong International Trust and Investment Corp.
The facility has a final maturity of five years with no put or call options. Pricing has not been finalised, bankers noted.
